channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billionaire tech founder Joe Liemandt says getting an MBA isn’t worth it and you don’t learn a ‘fraction’ of what you would as an entrepreneur
item.description: When asked by podcaster Codie Sanchez if people should get an MBA, Joe Liemandt promptly said “no.”

item.title: Michelle Obama shares her styling hacks that make her confident and allow her to ‘do the work’
item.description: The attorney and former U.S. First Lady never follows trends, wears outfits that make her feel beautiful, and tailors all her clothes to make differen...

item.title: Scott Galloway fears a market crash or social crisis in the next year. A top finance professor recommends putting money into baseball cards
item.description: NYU Stern Finance professor told Galloway the market isn't pricing in "a market and economic crisis that is potentially catastrophic."

item.title: Trump Organization Announces Maldives Resort—And Offers Investors Stakes Via Crypto
item.description: The luxury property will be called the Trump International Hotel Maldives and is set to launch in late 2028.

item.title: Gen Z college students have found a new cheat code to land them an AI-proof job: double majoring
item.description: Doubling majoring is exploding on college campuses—and it could be Gen Z’s secret weapon in a shaky job market.

item.title: Good News For Consultants. Google CEO: No Company Is Immune To AI
item.description: AI is reshaping every workflow, and Sundar Pichai, Google’s CEO, warns that no company is immune. An opportunity for tool builder, workflow designer a...

item.title: A Surprising Update About ‘The Beast In Me’ Season 2 On Netflix
item.description: Will The Beast in Me get a season 2? There's a new update on that front that is not exactly what most would be expecting from the series.

item.title: How J. Crew’s CIO Used AI To Supercharge The Brand’s Comeback
item.description: Five years ago, J. Crew filed for bankruptcy. Thanks in part to its technology initiatives, the company is now making a steady comeback.

item.title: Cloudflare Outage Latest: Spotify, X, ChatGPT And Many Other Sites Down
item.description: Just weeks after the Amazon Web Services outage took down much of the internet, it seems a technical problem with Cloudflare is causing problems onlin...

item.title: Investment alarm bells ring: For the first time in 20 years, AI bubble fears have fund managers saying companies are overdoing it
item.description: Even Wall Street thinks this has gone too far. Some 202 panelists managing $550 billion in AUM are raising a concern unseen since 2005, according to B...

item.title: Some of the jobless-claims numbers obstructed by the shutdown just leaked out
How a sold-off bitcoin resembles Amazon and Google after their IPOs
What you should know about Cloudflare — and this morning’s internet outages
Fund managers are bullish, B. of A. survey finds. A Fed pause could change that.
Economic calendar: Shutdown-delayed government data about to start flowing
Bessent warns 'perfect storm' brewing for beef prices, details Trump's $2,000 plan for working families
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent warns of a "perfect storm" brewing with Biden-era inflation and tariff solutions, as the Trump administration conside...

item.title: Trump team pledges to drive beef prices down by 2026 as USDA chief pushes back on $10-per-pound warning
item.description: President Trump is "hyper-focused" on bringing beef prices down and bringing relief to America's cattle ranchers, according to Agriculture Secretary B...

item.title: Google to invest $40B in Texas data centers in major AI push
item.description: Google plans a $40 billion Texas data center investment, creating thousands of jobs as tech companies compete for AI infrastructure capacity.

item.title: Omaha Steaks CEO warns American families will soon face '$10-a-pound reality' for beef
item.description: Omaha Steaks CEO Nate Rempe predicts ground beef will reach $10 per pound by the Q3 2026, with prices unlikely to drop meaningfully until 2027, giving...

item.title: Portable mortgages explained: What they are and how they work
item.description: The Trump administration is "actively evaluating" portable mortgages to help homeowners keep low rates as home prices remains elevated.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
